html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2023-00682023-02-03HC
ActFood and Drugs Act
Patent Act
SubjectRegulations Amending Certain Regulations Concerning the Sale of Drugs (Public or Canadian Armed Forces Health Emergencies)
PrecisRegulations Amending CERTAIN REGULATIONS CONCERNING THE SALE OF DRUGS (PUBLIC OR CANADIAN ARMED FORCES HEALTH EMERGENCIES) in order to (1) create a new division in the Regulations permitting the Minister of Health to authorize the sale of a drug from a manufacturer to a Canadian public health official for use in an immediate public health or military health emergency or for stockpiling the drug in anticipation of a future emergency, event or incident; and (2) make consequential amendments and minor non-substantive amendments.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2023-0018 Publication Date: 2023-02-15
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Regulations Amending Certain Regulations Concerning the Sale of Drugs (Public or Canadian Armed Forces Health Emergencies)
precis: Regulations Amending CERTAIN REGULATIONS CONCERNING THE SALE OF DRUGS (PUBLIC OR CANADIAN ARMED FORCES HEALTH EMERGENCIES) in order to (1) create a new division in the Regulations permitting the Minister of Health to authorize the sale of a drug from a manufacturer to a Canadian public health official for use in an immediate public health or military health emergency or for stockpiling the drug in anticipation of a future emergency, event or incident; and (2) make consequential amendments and minor non-substantive amendments.
